  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Searchable, SampleListener, TestBean, TestElement, Visualizer
    public class BSFListener
extends BSFTestElement
implements java.lang.Cloneable, SampleListener, TestBean, Visualizer
    Needs to implement Visualizer so that TestBeanGUI can find the correct GUI class
